title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool, linen
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile (velvet), embossed
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of cream-colored velvet with a stamped design of a large-scale floral design. Made in imitation of Flemish sixteenth century wool velvet.
